description: Unique identifier for this repeating schedule rule.
Links the rule to a specific asset and maintenance procedure schedule entry.
Base interval quantity used with the selected cadence (days, weeks, months, years) to space occurrences; confirm unit pairing with cadence fields.
Encoded option flags that alter recurrence behavior (e.g., business days, holiday handling); likely a bitmask; confirm with SME.
Flag controlling whether a recurrence pattern is active for this schedule; confirm semantics with SME.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this rule.
Timestamp recorded when a user last edited this recurrence definition; may differ from system update time.
Indicates the record originated from data import rather than manual entry.
Code defining how due dates are computed (calendar-based, meter/usage-based, or other); confirm code set with SME.
Denotes that the schedule generates recurring occurrences instead of a single event.
Code describing daily pattern interpretation (e.g., every N days versus weekdays only); confirm values with SME.
Number of days between occurrences when using a daily pattern.
Number of weeks between occurrences when using a weekly pattern.
Includes Monday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Includes Tuesday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Includes Wednesday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Includes Thursday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Includes Friday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Includes Saturday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Includes Sunday in the weekly recurrence when enabled.
Code determining monthly pattern style (specific day-of-month or nth weekday); confirm values with SME.
Ordinal occurrence within the month for the nth-weekday pattern (e.g., first, second, last); confirm mapping with SME.
Day-of-week used with the nth-weekday monthly pattern; confirm code mapping with SME.
Number of months between occurrences for the nth-weekday monthly pattern.
Calendar day-of-month used for the specific-day monthly pattern.
Number of months between occurrences for the specific-day monthly pattern.
Code selecting the yearly pattern style (specific date or nth weekday of a month); confirm values with SME.
Ordinal occurrence within the month for the yearly nth-weekday pattern; confirm mapping with SME.
Day-of-week for the yearly nth-weekday pattern; confirm code mapping with SME.
Month used for the yearly nth-weekday pattern; confirm code mapping with SME.
Month used for the yearly specific-date pattern; likely paired with a day-of-month elsewhere; confirm with SME.
Number of years between occurrences for the yearly pattern; confirm semantics with SME.
Identifier of the user who originally created this rule.
Timestamp when this rule was created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last updated this rule.
Timestamp when the rule was last updated by a user.
